code:
const opportunities = [{
  id: 1,
  name: 'United World Colleges',
  href: 'https://www.tj.uwc.org/',
  description: 'Group of international schools that aims to make education a force to unite peoples, nations, and cultures for peace and a sustainable future.',
  notes: 'English required',
  imageAlt: 'United World Colleges',
  imageSrc: require('./images/UWCLogo.jpeg'),
  category: 'school'
}, {
  id: 2,
  name: 'UCA Graduate Summer School',
  href: 'https://ucentralasia.org/schools/school-of-professional-and-continuing-education/continuing-education-programme/spce-tajikistan',
  description: 'Take summer classes at the presigious UCA Graduate school and learn from the best professors in the country.',
  notes: 'High school seniors',
  imageAlt: 'UCA Graduate Summer School',
  imageSrc: require('./images/randomDude.png'),
  category: 'school'
}, {
  id: 3,
  name: 'Media School CABAR Asia',
  href: 'https://school.cabar.asia/en/',
  description: 'Online courses for the youth.',
  notes: 'Grade 12 only',
  imageAlt: 'Media School CABAR Asia',
  imageSrc: require('./images/CABAR.jpg'),
  category: 'course'
}, {
  id: 4,
  name: 'Ilmhona Skills Accelerator',
  href: 'https://ilmhona.org/',
  description: 'Online courses for learning valuable tech skills to do with web development.',
  notes: 'Russian required',
  imageAlt: 'Ilmhona Skills Accelerator',
  imageSrc: require('./images/ilmhona.jpg'),
  category: 'course'
}];
export default opportunities;

sourcesContent:
const opportunities = [
    {
      id: 1,
      name: 'United World Colleges',
      href: 'https://www.tj.uwc.org/',
      description: 'Group of international schools that aims to make education a force to unite peoples, nations, and cultures for peace and a sustainable future.',
      notes: 'English required',
      imageAlt: 'United World Colleges',
      imageSrc: require('./images/UWCLogo.jpeg'),
      category: 'school',
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      name: 'UCA Graduate Summer School',
      href: 'https://ucentralasia.org/schools/school-of-professional-and-continuing-education/continuing-education-programme/spce-tajikistan',
      description: 'Take summer classes at the presigious UCA Graduate school and learn from the best professors in the country.',
      notes: 'High school seniors',
      imageAlt: 'UCA Graduate Summer School',
      imageSrc: require('./images/randomDude.png'),
      category: 'school',
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      name: 'Media School CABAR Asia',
      href: 'https://school.cabar.asia/en/',
      description: 'Online courses for the youth.',
      notes: 'Grade 12 only',
      imageAlt: 'Media School CABAR Asia',
      imageSrc: require('./images/CABAR.jpg'),
      category: 'course',
    },
    {
      id: 4,
      name: 'Ilmhona Skills Accelerator',
      href: 'https://ilmhona.org/',
      description: 'Online courses for learning valuable tech skills to do with web development.',
      notes: 'Russian required',
      imageAlt: 'Ilmhona Skills Accelerator',
      imageSrc: require('./images/ilmhona.jpg'),
      category: 'course',
    },
  ]

  export default opportunities
